summary: This bill, HR 2099, amends the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act. It mandates a study to review the outcomes of entrepreneurial skills development programs over three years. The study will assess successful practices, mentor programs, provider qualifications, employer engagement, program outcomes, participant progress measurement, credential attainment, economic impact, business development, job creation, program readiness assessment, and participant earnings. It also includes recommendations for expanding program access and expands training for entrepreneurs.
